sc.networking.clients

Class GameLoaderClient

  • XStreamClient
    • sc.networking.clients.GameLoaderClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPollsHistory

    public class GameLoaderClient
extends XStreamClient
implements IPollsHistory

    This client serves the purpose to load a game state from any XML file (a replay for example). It is used to load a given board to play on.
